info.headline: Flood Warning issued March 23 at 10:50AM EDT until March 26 at 3:31PM EDT by NWS Indianapolis IN
info.description:
...The National Weather Service in Indianapolis IN has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Indiana...
White River at Petersburg.
.Additional rainfall amounts around 0.5 to 1 inch today will lead to minor river flooding on the White River near Petersburg by Monday morning. Minor flooding is then expected to continue through early Wednesday morning.
* WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast.
* WHERE...White River at Petersburg.
* WHEN...From Monday morning to Wednesday afternoon.
* IMPACTS...At 17.0 feet, Flooding affects low agricultural lands, low oil fields and closes Bottoms Rd...Brothers Rd and East Governors Road in Knox County. In agricultural season...farmers are concerned at this stage.
* ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 10:30 AM EDT Sunday /9:30 AM CDT Sunday/ the stage was 15.0 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage tomorrow morning to a crest of 16.7 feet Tuesday morning. It will then fall below flood stage early Wednesday morning. - Flood stage is 16.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction:
Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas.
Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks.
Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/ind.
The next statement should be issued late tonight by around 200 AM EDT /100 AM CDT/.

parameter.value: FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM MONDAY MORNING TO WEDNESDAY AFTERNOON

area.areaDesc: Daviess, IN; Gibson, IN; Knox, IN; Pike, IN
